>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.zGohTRdAHLCUFeeK]{Projected (Su)}

You can trick reality into miscalculating your size. As a move action, you gain one of the following benefits: you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.sguC9bc7vP22wrXW]{Compression (Ex)}AA ability, your size decreases by one size category, or your size increases by one size category. If this transformation would increase your size to Large or larger and your reach is less than 10 feet, your reach becomes 10 feet. If your size decreases to Small or Medium, your reach decreases by 5 feet (minimum 5 feet). If your size becomes Tiny or smaller, you reach decreases by 5 feet (minimum 0 feet).

The transformation lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1). After you use this ability, you canâ€™t do so again until after you take a 10-minute rest to regain Stamina Points.
